short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protecting people from misinformation and fake news.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fact Hunt is a social journalism platform to hunt fake news. Through this browser extension you can find rebuttal of any article on the web. If rebuttals are not found then you can request Fact Hunt team to provide a rebuttal.
